entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 2:52 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
